@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.linuxidc.com/Linux/") {
body #tracqfloater,
body div table tbody tr[align="center"],
body div #navbar,
body div #navsub,
body div #footer,
#printBody div.linub,
#bodyTd.mm div div a img,
#bodyTd.mm div div.linuc,
html body div.twidth div.linus,
body div table tbody tr td[class="linuz"],
body div table tbody tr td .lframe,
body div table tbody tr td .mframe,
.mm div[align="center"] p[align="center"],
#content p a[href="http://www.linuxidc.com"]
{display:none}

body div table tbody tr td .mframe:first-child
{display:inline !important}
}
